name: Game of Thrones Art Card Set
description:
8 card set of portraits of various Game of Thrones characters. 

These cards are 3.5"x2.5" (Trading Card size) and include a hard plastic case. Included in the set are:

Jon Snow
Arya Stark
Robb Stark
Y’Gritte
Melisandre of Asshai
Stannis Baratheon
Tyrion Lannister
and
Daenerys Targaryen

Each card features the character’s name on the back as well as a memorable quote.

name: 6"x6" Original Custom Portrait (Framed)
description: A 6" square custom portrait of you or someone you know. I have an on-going project creating portraits of friends and acquaintances I have met online. Here's how this works, you are commissioning me to do a portrait based on a photo you select. This can be uploaded to a photosharing site (Google+, Flickr, Picasa, Photobucket, etc.) or emailed to me directly. I work in black india ink and ink wash (small spot watercolor is also available for no extra charge). I use archival quality illustration boards and only the highest quality inks. Your painting will be framed and mounted (Frame dimensions 12.5" x 12.5") Please visit this set on Flickr for some examples.

If you would like the original painting, please see this item) Please visit this set on Flickr for more examples.

name: Jon Stewart - SANITY Sticker (10 Pack)
description:
10 pack of 4"x6" Silkscreened Vinyl stickers (BEST VALUE! Save a whopping 10 bucks!) In an homage to Shepard Fairey's iconic Obama HOPE portrait I present SANITY. Because when HOPE is lost, the lost hope for SANITY! I had these printed by Stickrobot, (the very same team that printed all of the original HOPE stickers) and they came out beautifully and are built to last.
“All of our stickers are made of 100% industrial strength caliber vinyl with an aggressive permanent adhesive. Our stickers are waterproof, weatherproof and fade resistant. Before the stickers are cut, we add a clear, gloss 100% UV coating. Our stickers have a 3-5 year effective capability against any weather. Our stickers are weather proof... The kind you see stuck to a ski-lift and 10 years later, they're still shining in all their glory. We are robots. Our sticker are superior robot quality.” --stickrobot
